mapper.insert: INSERT INTO waiting_tb ( waiting_id, user_id, restaurant_id, wait_number, party_size, status, created_at, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{waitingId}, #{userId}, #{restaurantId}, #{waitNumber}, #{partySize}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{isDeleted} )
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(wait_number), 0) FROM waiting_tb WHERE restaurant_id = #{id} AND DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()
